summary: This document is a series of email exchanges between Richard Kahn and Chad Markland regarding financial consulting services at TD Ameritrade. Kahn, representing HBRK Associates, is seeking to discuss financial needs and investment solutions with Markland, who is a Senior Financial Consultant.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is associated with HBRK Associates and is seeking to discuss financial matters with Chad Markland.

persons.name: Chad Markland
persons.context: Chad Markland is a Senior Financial Consultant at TD Ameritrade, providing personalized financial guidance to Richard Kahn.

connections.description: Richard Kahn is a client seeking financial consulting services from Chad Markland.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn is associated with HBRK Associates Inc.
Chad Markland is a Senior Financial Consultant at TD Ameritrade.
The correspondence discusses financial needs and investment solutions.
The document emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication.
There are multiple mentions of the need for personalized financial guidance.
